subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Inter Milan swept aside the Asian champion Seongnam Ilhwa, 3-0, to advance to the Club World Cup final and take some pressure off the beleaguered coach Rafa Benitez.
snippet: Inter Milan swept aside the Asian champion Seongnam Ilhwa, 3-0, to advance to the Club World Cup final and take some pressure off the beleaguered coach Rafa Benitez.
